infos.value: Ugh!
It's the end of the line.
N-not yet!
It's over, Serjes. Glaciela's reinforcements have turned the tables on us.
He's right. There is naught that can be done now.
Wh-what are you saying!?
Alas...
You're not telling me we should just lay down and die without a fight!?
Calm down.
I have no intention of taking your lives.
Ow...
You needn't worry. This wound is shallow.
It would seem that you are the more skilled combatants.
One would have to admit it. And yet...
To fail in one's duty means death. King Khury is not one for forgiveness.
What if we were to surrender?
...Surrender!?
Mont, what nonsense is this? We've earned our victory.
Glaciela... There is no doubt that we would be dead if not for your aid.
But you have to leave this one to me. Please.
We will surrender and be taken to Wezette Castle as prisoners of war.
Do we have a deal? This way, you can save face before the king.
B-but...
Lord Mont, if you do this...you'll be at the mercy of the king.
You should take more time to seriously consider the consequences.
I'm honestly glad so many of you are concerned for me.
However, we have nowhere else to turn than Wezette.
Therefore, I'll do anything to keep our alliance alive.
...Very well. We will do whatever is within our power to assist you.
Mont... Are you prepared to face execution?
I do not plan on leading us to our deaths.
Since we last met, it's as if you've become an entirely different person from the Mont I knew.
I'm the same Mont I've always beenâ€”and ever will be.
Minwu, let's go.
Lady Glaciela, are you sure this is a good idea?
If this is Mont's decision, then we must respect it.
Even so... What if King Khury has a change of heart and decides to aid Lord Mont?
Simple. Then we shall fight. We'll show no mercy.
Glaciela...
She took off without a backward glance, didn't she? Even though you're more or less her betrothed...
Let's go. Wezette Castle awaits us.
